definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: The epidemic was stopped before the annual pilgrimage to Mecca got under way.
sentences.chinese: 这传染病在一年一度进行麦加朝圣之前停止。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近来，蜱媒传染病引起了国内传染病界的重视。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近来，蜱媒传染病引起了国内传染病界的重视。

sentences.english: People catch all kinds of infections in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 人们在冬天易患各种各样的传染病。

sentences.english: The vaccine was used to protect the whole population against infection.
sentences.chinese: 冬天人们易患多种传染病。

sentences.english: In low-resource settings, infectious diseases continue to be the major killer.
sentences.chinese: 在资源匮乏地区，传染病仍然是主要杀手。

sentences.english: The space periodic solution and chaos of a class of infectious disease model are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论一类传染病模型的空间周期解及混沌问题。

sentences.english: Chancroid is a sexually transmitted bacterial infection.
sentences.chinese: 软性下疳是一种性接触传播的细菌性传染病。

sentences.english: Infectious diseases are not the only problem.
sentences.chinese: 那里不只是传染病问题。

sentences.english: TB is the number-one infectious disease killer in the world. Early detection saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 肺结核是全球头号传染病杀手，发现得早能救你一命。

sentences.english: Potential problems range from allergies to the spread of infectious diseases, they said.
sentences.chinese: 这些危害轻则引起过敏，重可导致传染病的传播。

sentences.english: Continue obtaining title of Shanghai city infectious disease prevention and cure job advanced individual for 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 连续三年获上海市传染病防治工作先进个人的称号。

sentences.english: Avian leukosis in egg-type chickens is infectious neoplastic disease caused by avian leukosis viruse subgroup J( ALV-J).
sentences.chinese: 蛋鸡J亚群禽白血病是病毒引起的肿瘤性传染病。

sentences.english: Therefore, amebic dysentery was the predominant cause during this outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴痢疾为法定乙类传染病。

sentences.english: A 24-hour control room is established in NICD.
sentences.chinese: 在国立传染病研究所设立了一个24小时控制室。

sentences.english: Most people who get these diseases recover fully.
sentences.chinese: 很多感染这些传染病的人，都能充分康复。

definition: hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
